build.buildCommand: npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20260102120000_add_store_location_and_special_code 2>/dev/null || true; npx prisma migrate deploy 2>&1; npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate 2>&1 || echo 'DB push failed (expected with existing data), continuing...'; npm run start:prod
